bibl.title: Deixis and Everyday Expressions in Alcaeus frs. 129 V and 130b V.
bibl.note: Paper delivered in September 2004 in Molyvos. - Deixis. - Synkrisis of frg. 129 and 130b. - Everyday expressions. - Reflections on the survey. - Conclusions. - Appendix: Erinyes in archaic Greek verse.

bibl.title: Donum natalicium digitaliter confectum Gregorio Nagy septuagenario a discipulis collegis familiaribus oblatum. A Virtual Birthday Gift Presented to Gregory Nagy on Turning Seventy by his Students, Colleagues and Friends.

bibl.seg: Edmunds Lowell, Deixis and Everyday Expressions in Alcaeus frs. 129 V and 130b V.

Victor Bers, David Elmer, Douglas Frame and Leonard Muellner (Edd.), Donum natalicium digitaliter confectum Gregorio Nagy septuagenario a discipulis collegis familiaribus oblatum. A Virtual Birthday Gift Presented to Gregory Nagy on Turning Seventy by his Students, Colleagues and Friends (Washington, D.C., 2012) s.p., 3 figg. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://chs.harvard.edu/wa/pageR?tn=ArticleWrapper&bdc=12&mn=4353 >.]

Paper delivered in September 2004 in Molyvos. - Deixis. - Synkrisis of frg. 129 and 130b. - Everyday expressions. - Reflections on the survey. - Conclusions. - Appendix: Erinyes in archaic Greek verse.
